Name: Donara
description:
Meet Donara, 38! Donara is a hardworking and enthusiastic farmer who loves cherry fruits, cherry blossom, and cherry sales! Donara and her husband Arthur, 44, look after a large orchard of cherry trees. Donara has twin daughters aged 13 and a son of 17. Donara also takes care of her father-in-law, 80.

Donara and Arthur patiently grow cherry trees and after harvest gathering, they sell cherries in the local marketplaces and in their neighbourhood.

Now, Donara has applied for this loan to pay for soil plowing services as well as pay for the pruning of her cherry orchard in order to have a rich cherry harvest to offer to the marketplace. This loan will truly be a gift to Donara of another battle-free year.
